test_cases.name: Login with empty username and password
test_cases.description: Verify the behavior when attempting to log in with empty username and password fields.
steps: Step 1: Leave the 'Username or email address' field empty.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should be displayed indicating that the username or email address is required.
Expected result 2: An error message should be displayed indicating that the password is required.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with email containing space
test_cases.description: Verify the system's response to an email address containing a space.
steps: Step 1: Enter 'test @example.com' (with a space) into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter any password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: An error message should appear indicating an invalid email format.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with extremely long email
test_cases.description: Test the UI's handling of an extremely long email address.
steps: Step 1: Enter an email address exceeding 254 characters into the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter any password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected result 1: The application should either truncate the email, display an error message about the length, or handle it gracefully without issues.

elements.description: Username or email address input field

test_cases.name: Login with SQL Injection Attempt
test_cases.description: Attempt SQL injection in the username field.
steps: Step 1: Enter 'test@example.com' or '1'='1' --' in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter any password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected Result 1: The application should not execute the SQL injection and should handle the input securely. An error message indicating invalid credentials is expected.
